parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
A false witness. From pseudes and a kindred form of martus; a spurious witness, i.e. Bearer of untrue testimony.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
